titles.title: To direct the Federal Communications Commission to establish an advisory committee to develop best practices regarding how to combat unlawful robocalls made to hospitals and how hospitals can protect themselves from such calls, and for other purposes.
Protecting Patients and Doctors from Unlawful Robocalls Act of 2019
Protecting Patients and Doctors from Unlawful Robocalls Act of 2019
Protecting Patients and Doctors from Unlawful Robocalls Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
